venue.address_2: By Union Oyster House near Faneuil Hall
venue.name: Hennessey's Hooley House

item.description:
Join a great event for singles. Mingle and find the "lock" for your "key" - every Gal gets a Lock, every Guy gets a Key when you arrive.

Complimentary appetizers at 6:00 PM!! Drawings for PRIZES!! Business or Casual attire (Jeans OK)

You have 2 hours from 6pm to 8pm to find your matching lock/key.

After 8pm, there will be Live bands, music, and even more fun & festivity. Your event ticket covers staying for the rest of the evening. The doors at that time are opened to the public with a cover charge.

WE HAVE A SPECIAL DISCOUNT CODE! This will get you $10 off the $20 advance purchase ticket price!

The discount code: BBTCsavesten
This code will save BBTC members $10 off the individual advance purchase ticket price of $20 [b]up until 2:00 on May 15.

For more info, and to purchase your tickets in advance, please check out:
Lock & Key Event web-site
Event Flier

NOTE: You have to purchase your tickets from the above web-site or at the door (will be $25 at the door). BBTC is not selling the tickets for this event.

Please let Marie Austin (BBTC "point person" for this event) know if you are going to attend.

3 hour Validated Parking at the Parcel #7 Garage (next to Haymarket) $3 *

*Parcel #7 Garage charges $3 for a validated ticket for 3 hours or under. It is located a block away & allows you to exit and reenter to start the process over for an additional 3 hours/$3
item.why: It's spring - almost summer - great time to meet new people and make some pals for the summer!
item.name: "Lock + Key" Singles Party at Hennessy's Hooley House
